009package Tools_;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.WindowManager;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
016import imagingbook.common.ij.GuiTools;
017
018/**
019 * ImageJ plugin, resizes the window of the given image to fit an arbitrary,
020 * user-specified magnification factor. The resulting window size is limited by
021 * the current screen size. The window size is reduced if too large but the
022 * given magnification factor remains always unchanged.
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 * @version 2020/10/08
026 */
027public class Zoom_Exact implements PlugIn {
028        
029        private static boolean LOG_OUTPUT = false;
030        
031        @Override
032        public void run(String arg) {
033                
034                ImagePlus im = WindowManager.getCurrentImage();
035                if (im == null) {
036                        IJ.showMessage("No image open");
037                        return;
038                }
039                
040                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Zoom Exact");
041                gd.addNumericField("Magnification (%): ", GuiTools.getMagnification(im) * 100, 2);
042                gd.addCheckbox("Log output", LOG_OUTPUT);
043                gd.showDialog();
044                if (gd.wasCanceled())
045                        return;
046                
047                double mag = gd.getNextNumber() / 100.0;
048                LOG_OUTPUT = gd.getNextBoolean();
049                
050                if (mag < 0.001) {
051                        IJ.showMessage(String.format("Out of range magnification:\n%.3f", mag));
052                        return;
053                }
054                
055                if (GuiTools.zoomExact(im, mag)) {
056                        if (LOG_OUTPUT) {
057                                IJ.log(String.format("new magnification: %.3f",  GuiTools.getMagnification(im)));
058                        }
059                }
060                else {
061                        IJ.showMessage(Zoom_Exact.class.getSimpleName() + " failed");
062                }
063        }
064}
